articles.author: Anand Krishnamoorthy
articles.title: Asian Stocks Set to Extend Rally to Another Record: Markets Wrap - bloomberg.com
articles.description: Asian stocks extended their rally to a fresh record as a rebound in US technology shares gathered pace, easing pressure on markets after worries over outsized spending on artificial intelligence.
articles.content:

articles.title: Just look at Ayaneo's absolute unit of a Windows gaming "handheld" - Ars Technica
articles.description: The Ayaneo Next II pushes past 3 pounds, 13 inches wide, and costs up to $4,300.

articles.title: Instagram and YouTube owners built 'addiction machines', trial told - BBC
articles.description: The tech giants are under scrutiny over social media addiction in a landmark jury trial in Los Angeles
